text: Kröger in the 2.4 Metre. Heiko Kröger (born 27 March 1966) is a German Paralympic sailor who won the gold medal in the 2.4 Metre class in the 2000 Paralympics and a silver medal in the 2012 edition.https://www.paralympic.org/heiko-kroeger. Kröger also has 8 World championships titles. ==References== ==External links== * * * IPC Paralympic Competitor Biography Category:1966 births Category:Living people Category:German male sailors (sport) Category:Sailors at the 2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Sailors at the 2004 Summer Paralympics Category:Sailors at the 2008 Summer Paralympics Category:Sailors at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:Sailors at the 2016 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic medalists in sailing Category:Medalists at the 2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 2012 Summer Paralympics Category:2.4 Metre class sailors Category:Paralympic gold medalists for Germany Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Germany
title: Heiko Kröger
